Nci.NCI_SQL: alter table T_JFW_CODEMODEL add(icon varchar2(100),openicon varchar2(100),shortcuttype varchar2(64),shortcutnum number(4))

create table T_JFW_CODEMODEL_SHORTCUT(SEQKEY VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL primary key, userID VARCHAR2(64), codeValue VARCHAR2(100), codeNAME VARCHAR2(500), clickNUM number(10), LATELYDATE DATE, MODELNAME VARCHAR2(64), LOCKED NUMBER(4))
